title: Near Las Vegas Speedway, Easy freeway access, Large studio apartments
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Easy freeway access', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', '-High speed WIFI included', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Large studio apartments', '-Laundry facilities', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
